Blog.post: so long never post le...common round the corner...hope the special person in my heart will pass wif flyinf colours...haizz year going to end...my bd round the corner too...wad to buy for myself...oct 26 is nearing too wad should i buy for her??...i scare she gomme back wad i gif her...or she might throw em away...then i will be very sad :(...haizz...maybe i'm imaginating things...but i noe la...i no chance one...0%...ZERO thats it...=D...i knew it la...no need ppl to tell me...

Ok...so long never write...common tests need study la....sorry hor...i also lazy to write...these days are plaine boring without someone to speak to...i might go crazy...i can only think abt her..haizzz...going crazy le...The Craziest Man/Boy in sg is me...hahahzzz...i found Dunnoz can be a word thats useful =D...lolzz...hope she pass her common test not like mid year.. :) and everyone else too...Dun fail and die in mr oh's hand...he is going to make me help him make a game...i guess that will server an purpose...thats to use it on me...hopefully not man...i would certainly die with the games planned ahead for me...but being the old brid of the games means i have a greater chance of survival too :)....no worries dude...Currently for the time being i'm safe...no damage physically...but inside me emotionally, i got a few big blows... even with that great defence could do anything to these damage....Smile and act happy will get me happier...so not so bad afterall...got used to it..once,twice,thrice...and on and on..haha.... Not bad sia..chem i got 24/30...hope physic i can get hig markss too...Of cuz for this special person in my heart > i really really really really hope she would get top of cuz..so she won't get scolded by her mom... of cuz...haha... Year is coming to an End and the days to my birthdays can be counted...btw wads should i buy for her??Wad she like i also dunno...later she gif me back how??Dear Blog pls tell me how....i really scare she give me back wad i gif her...then if that really happens i'll cry...really thats bad... :(...budden i know i haf no %% one la..haizz.... wad to buy for myself on my birthday har?? maybe a phone...maybe something to eat can le...anything i'm happy...as long as i'm happy can let.. regards, Craziest Man For SL in SG Good Luck to MYSELF Blessed[GM]

Sianz...ytd forgot to post...ytd go jogathon lor...starting see 2 of my frens fall down and cramp...haizz...i see liao scared dun dare to run,walk for 3 mins plus untill i'm 50% uphill where there is alot of stones...then i'm realised i'm lagging behind then i started to jog...actually i drank 2-3 cans of red bull alot of energy hehe..i was jogging wif jingwei,conserve energy...then when i reach 3.5km le...starting no energy liao...low energy..critical condition...made my way up the upslope,got into the highway no strength le...i walk awhile..see miss lee...run past me...so i catch up wif her...cannot lose face..then run pass kelvin tan...tok to me delay me for 10 secs plus...then finnaly turn le...turn back to starting point..very steep...then mr tham wha lau...suddenly no breath stop in front of me...he brake i brake...but i too fast liao...going to fall...i shouted run!!! then luckly he dogded...i regained my balanced...luckly...never fall...then run into there...they never tell me how many..i guess should be 30plus to 40plus...wtf sia...alvin win me...tyco sia...last year run the school one...he lose face man...i win him alot...sia la...today down wif fever got alot of blisters...

sianz..ytd forgot to add blogs...lol :D...haizz...u entred my email har?...well changed my nick...i swear i won't change my nick..and will not touch it...well...haizz...i dun have e courage to call and talk to u...i am really missing u...i call u also dunno wad to tok abt...our relationship is getting worse i think :(...dunno wad can i do...how to make u happi?how to make u laugh?i miss ur smiles..u r so serious when u r angry...i like when u r angry...:'( i'm so sad wad shall i do??

i wont tell any1 animore..but if i dun tell anyone its very hard to leave it in my heart...i like to voice it out..but u restrict here restrict there...dun let me put in blog...dun let me sae out...haizz..nvm la..let me keep quiet and calm down..lucky today just scratch my hand..a bit more i'll lose my hand...thx to the lock that i cut...

My fault la...cuz i never go ps..i know sorry is not the way out..but wad to do??i go got ppl say i "zhong se qing you" "ps ur frens"..scold me...i dun go,no ppl scold me,but ppl angry me...dun tok to me...i regretted i did'nt go but,....i dunno wad to do lar...who can guide me...i really like her lor..i really hope u can accept my apology..bcuz in the first place i told u i was cuming,then i called to tell u i was'nt...i dunno wad to sae coz i'm not a sweet talker....i really hope that i can be one or one who can understand ppl's feeling...so i can noe wad u r thinking...u know lor...u think wad i dunno...u call me dun tok..i dun tok u scold me lor..anything la...i'm not any of the above..but i can try to be one...a few time i really hope i can go back to the past...so i can prevent myself from knowing u...so i spend alot of time researching into time machine...sumtimes i really hope that i can go into the future and see who is ur husband and kill him...but no, after hours,days,weeks of hard labour,i got no result,partly due to the limited capital i'm given..maybe i can try pratising ESP so i can understand u better....u ask me to be happy..i tried but...i can't if i'm not sad i'll be angry...how but i'm happy only sumtimes...when u treat me good...i remember when i first know u, i'm quite happy...but from happy to sad to angry..this process got a few factors...resulting to my emotions...but when i'm sad,or even angry,i need to put up a front and respect the teachers who are unreasonables,biased....i really dun like this lor...i respect ppl who r worthy for it...but i need to put up an act...u see me everyday happy,or happy go lucky,i'm not...but i'm always sad or angry

juz got back from the wedding dinner,today did alot of things,go lan shop,go mac,wedding dinner alot la...worst of all...at mac she say wan to eat..i tell her i got $5 plus..then wendy say $4 enuff..then i take back $1 plus...later she return me the money...wtf for wad reasons...also dun wan tok to me...wad i do lor??I still got 7 more ideals to finish up pls my eng homework...and then i lost my stack of A3 paper wad should i do now??so many problems

ToDae I saw nkf's show...i feel that they really need our help,even though we r not related to them in any way,but the are really pitiful,if we do not help them who will??i am going to call their hotline later if my mother permits me..if she dun i'll have to pay the $15 myself...after seeing the scences of those "victims"i felt like crying...bcuz they are attacked by these diseases...plz help them if u can..:'(

FIRST DAY 1.I lost My Hp in class during physics lesson 2.i lend it to guowei so i lost it 3.i report to mr oh 4.after mr oh check bag 5.mr kowk miss aw came..nothing found NEXT DAY 1.mr kwok came to class in the morning 2.gave guowei the phone and said 3 sec 1 boys found in in sec1 toilet 3.i came up to class...mr kwok left so i also got my phone back 4.did nothing till midnight 5.between 1135 and 1200hrs,i inserted my Hicard and switch on my phone 6.to my amaze i found my smses and pictures deleted,in fact i found a person's pic[Hakim]taken in broad daylight,background same as behind boon keng mac,the basketball court area. 7.Came online told ming sing,called Meng Keat told him.. 3rD Day 1.waited after school and talked to mr oh about my suspicion 2.he told me to tell mr kwok 3.i did'nt,he helped me tell 4.mr kwok said i muz see him on monday *********END********** To Be Continued

Got back my phone...look wad i found..Alhakim picture??lolzzz...i lost all my inbox,outbox...alot shili ones..in fact all...and i lost their pics also...i missed my pics especially shili picture so cute..but instead i found hakim picture...taken in broad daylight as seen in the background..it has also the background of those in kallang basketball court..i suggest that hakim was part of the group that stole..in fact maybe he was the one who stole...this is a suspected theft case..i am going to hand this over to the school authority since i have already found concrete evidence...its up to them to decide wad should the thief do... Haizzz sianz...today pe so tiring...but after pe..mr oh worst..make Hakim,Guowei and me do push-up..Although We,in fact most of us believed that guowei is'nt the one that took my fone,he was pumped...i agree that i should be punished cuz i took the fone out..Today We Realised that when mr tan chin poh spoke about the incident which i lost my phone,Wan Faiz was looking to himself,not daring to look at the teacher,was that his conscience telling him to admit??Since i got back my fone,i'll let the matter rest...But i feel sad for ming sing's MP3..Lets Hope That we can get concrete evidence to proof that my..in fact most of our instints r rite..cuz most of the lost items were found in Faiz's bag...mysteriously mine was found by 3 sec1 bois??haha funny...covered up story by DM??Nvm if i can catch him...i will take pics wif my phone...hand it over to the....POLICE of cuz..wad can the school do??see parents..parents cry plead...nothing much...police he go boys home hahaha..i'll be happy..then 1 malay boy better still class disruptor off..i will say "WAN FAIZ DOWN!!!!!" cheers weili, cuming back wif more info, including pictures of him when he commits crime,in the Name OF Blessed i Swear to bring him to JUSTICE!

Fuck Malays...steal my hp...grr dun let me find concrete evidence..i i find u'll be dead...i'll report it to the police...not school authority..make sure u go boys home..u fuckers.. my fone got so many shili msgs...u take...u admit...i nvm..u all dun know how important shili is to me... i luv her so much...all my contacts r old and online frens...if u return to me...i'll keep ur name confidential..if not I REPEAT...I WILL REPORT TO POLICE!!!!!!!!!!!

Yoz guys...so sian..i'm back from work earn a few dollars enuff for me to survive this week..later post sum back time stories for u...on SPI forum though...copyrighted..cuz i no stories liao..my own personal encounter not so scary...just some unseen holding on to my leg..pity myself..sobx sobx..but lucky no scratch mark like last time when i sleep sumthing scratched me...pain sia...dunno who scratch me...maybe MeLvIn mao mao...Elvis Presley...cat king...haha

ADVICE:KEEP EVERYTHING TO UR SELF...dun tell ppl anything,either they tell others or tell the person directly... and like i say waiting is useless...i did it for twice and none show results...its not show abit liddat or wad...its like they treat u only as good fren,buddy or brother... even thought they may classify u as special,special in wad way u muz know...like me zhi zhou duo qing...J,JJ,GW help also useless one la...No matter how hard they try is 0%..0% i know my own limits,i try my best to forget u...but i can't so i try not to call u...but till today,i guess a few more months will do the job...i know i not up to standard... so i dun call u everyday to talk or perhaps to u is distubing u like last time...last time till now is my fault not urs la...if not me all this wun't happen le.................BEST WISHES FOR U AND HIM,HOPE YOUR MATCHMAKE SUCCESS................AND FOR MYSELF.....i don require much as everytime i do it is often a bad ending like the recent one............i know my limitations,i dun meet ur expetation,i'm lously,i sucks,i'm stupid,i disturb u,AND so many thing la....

sorry...so long never blog here le..i may not post anymore cuz the acc.. got something that is irrelevant...Blessed is down...not by aresdens...although Blessed a.k.a Noname guildmaster of S.W.A.T TeAm Guild maybe be thought physically...but soft inside...just like a tortoise....shell is hard,inside is soft...this is the only place where i can voice myself out,and i won't stop myself again,i may create a new blog,new email,or maybe dun use computer anymore and give up my dream of software enginnering..MoOd:Dunno how to sad,basically SaD...Blessed is well known but yet died in the hands of *****...all ppl who read this dun tell anyone pls..this is the last time i beg u... cause this is my only secert place to voice myself not letting her know...know also nvm la...nothing will change one...NOTHING...
